summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of Role Play Capsules feature - Duolingo-style gamified learning platform. All 12 features tested successfully. PUPIL card navigation, 12 divisions grid, division detail view with NEST levels, module capsules, and complete lesson flow (Intro, Learn, Quiz, Role Play, Complete) all working correctly.
passed_tests: Landing Page PUPIL card navigation to /role-play - SUCCESS
12 Divisions grid display on /role-play with correct icons and '5 Capsules' badges - SUCCESS
Division detail view (Legal Services) with NEST levels L1-L5 progress bar - SUCCESS
Careers section showing 6 careers with level ranges and demand badges - SUCCESS
Module capsules list with L1-L5 progression (Legal Foundations, Core Legal Practice, etc.) - SUCCESS
Starting a lesson from Legal Foundations module (legal_101) - SUCCESS
Lesson intro screen with 'Welcome to Legal Foundations' and Let's Begin button - SUCCESS
Learn content screen with 'The Indian Constitution' title and Key Points section - SUCCESS
Quiz screen with 'Quick Check!' title and 4 multiple choice options (A, B, C, D) - SUCCESS
Quiz answer selection highlights correct answer (green) and shows explanation - SUCCESS
Progress bar updates during lesson (1/7 -> 2/7 -> 3/7 etc.) - SUCCESS
D-COIN counter updates and accumulates (5 -> 15 -> 30 -> 55 -> 75) - SUCCESS
Role Play screen with scenario, task, hints, and textarea - SUCCESS
Module Complete screen with achievements and '+50 D-COIN Earned!' - SUCCESS
Module completion unlocks next module (Core Legal Practice shows 'Start' badge) - SUCCESS
Back navigation: header back-btn, exit-lesson-btn, back-to-divisions-btn all work - SUCCESS
Generic lesson template works for other divisions (Technology & IT tested) - SUCCESS
critical_code_review_comments: Code quality is excellent - well-structured React component with clear separation of concerns
All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing
NEST_LEVELS and DIVISIONS_CAPSULES data structures are comprehensive
LESSON_CONTENT for legal_101 has detailed content; other modules use generateGenericLessons() template
State management is clean with useState hooks for lesson progress, D-COIN, completed modules
Framer-motion animations are smooth and enhance UX
test_credentials: No auth required for Role Play Capsules page
seed_data_creation: None required - all data is static/mocked in frontend
context_for_next_testing_agent: Role Play Capsules feature fully tested. All 12 divisions display correctly with 5 modules each (L1-L5). Legal division has detailed lesson content (7 lessons: intro, learn, quiz, learn, quiz, roleplay, complete). Other divisions use generic 5-lesson template. D-COIN rewards accumulate correctly. Module completion unlocks next module. All navigation (back buttons, exit lesson) works. MOCKED: All lesson data, D-COIN rewards, and module completion status are static/mocked in frontend - no backend API calls.
mocked_apis_note: ALL DATA IS MOCKED IN FRONTEND - Lesson content, D-COIN rewards, and module completion status are static data in RolePlayCapsules.jsx. No backend API integration.
